Technical product manager cum Project Manager  
Share portfolio management web application to tracking of investors investments historical in 
Australian securities exchange. Record relative actions as buy, sell, stock split, demerger, bonus, 
capital return, 2nd payment, buyback and then calculate profit/loss and tax send to accountants. 
The application is built on responsive web design that supports desktop (cross browsers as Chrome, 
Firefox, and Edge) and iPad (Safari)
